amendment.description: Amendment to the Goss amendment (A001) sought to apply the provisions of the bill to all FY 1996 appropriations bills retroactively.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Goss amendment to apply the provisions of the bill to all FY 1996 appropriations bills retroactively.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Frost to the Goss amendment (A001).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frost amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 204 - 221 (Roll no. 656).
